title: 話OK便利店唔係藍店嘅同我入一入嚟

replies.msg:
OK同CCTVB間網店嘅合作都未完，點解唔係藍店呀！


不過，既然新買家係加拿大品牌就易話圍少少，大家可以send 電郵畀新買家ACT ( sac@couche-tard.com )，勸佢同CCTVB割蓆！　
跟手去埋ACT, cricle K個facebook派慘！留言！輕鬆，謝謝大家！

【勸誡任務@ 5 Nov】
💎 ACT電郵 (OK便利店買家) 💎
sac@couche-tard.com (電郵範本喺留言)

💎 ACT (OK便利店買家) 💎
https://www.facebook.com/CoucheTardQc

💎 Circle K (國際版) 💎
https://www.facebook.com/CircleKStores/



EMAIL template


Please Stop Cooperate with TVB

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing as a Hong Kong customer to express my concern regarding the marketing strategy of the Hong Kong Branch of Circle K.

Since 2019, the Hong Kong Branch of Circle K has become the logistic partner of Big Big Shop, an online store of HK Television Broadcasts Limited (TVB). TVB is a Pro-Chinese Communist Party(CCP) television station that reports biased and fake news, spreading propaganda for CCP, and trying its best to justify all misbehaviors that the HK Government has done, for instance, justifying the Chinese espionage in the US, HK police brutality, the delay of the LegCo election in 2020, etc. Therefore, We, some of the Hongkongers are greatly disappointed by this business cooperation and has boycotted Circle K for more than a year.

Canada and the United States are the countries that uphold universal values, for instance, pursuing freedom, democracy, and human rights. We hope ACT, the new buyer of Circle K (Hong Kong business) would stand with Hong Kong and redeem the reputation by stop cooperating with TVB. We are looking forward to your reply. Thank you, ACT and Circle K, very much for understanding.

Regards,
(Your Name)

電視廣播（0511）旗下Big Big Shop與OK便利店建立電子商貿合作協議，用戶訂購產品後，可於全港OK便利店取貨。

冀增加Big Big Shop貨品種類
無綫電視集團行政總裁李寶安表示，OK便利店擁逾330間分店，兩者合作後，將可與未能提供送貨服務的商戶合作，增加Big Big Shop的貨品種類。

OK便利店母公司、利亞零售行政總裁楊立彬表示，客戶購物後，若選擇送貨到OK便利店，有別於傳統網購需即時在網上付款，顧客可選擇在店內取貨的同時付款。他相信，做法可減輕客戶網上購物時對網絡安全的憂慮...

楊立彬相信，TVB在推廣方面有優勢，公司日後則會負責物流、分店取貨等，首要是做好中央倉存，希望做到下單後，1至2日後可取貨。但基於保密條款，雙方的平台分成、投資金額等則不便透露。


【TVB戰線懶人區】(最後更新5 Nov 2110)

replies.msg:
牛奶公司呀，仲藍，試過自動提交手足既CCTV比黑狗
依家頭買飲品就759/百佳/aboutthai
要買野食就搵就近黃店或者唔食當減肥，或者一早買定野食放公司
要買麵包就去a1 bakery或者759都有包買
買報紙就報紙檔/abouthai，有時街市入面都會有報紙檔賣

雖然唔係話必要時唔可以幫襯，始終有時就餓死都要買最平既野頂著下先，但希望盡量減少啦

Btw,提提你，ok=聖安娜
美心=711
華潤=vango
真係好有心

OK同CCTVB間網店嘅合作都未完，點解唔係藍店呀！


不過，既然新買家係加拿大品牌就易話圍少少，大家可以send 電郵畀新買家ACT ( sac@couche-tard.com )，勸佢同CCTVB割蓆！　
跟手去埋ACT, cricle K個facebook派慘！留言！輕鬆，謝謝大家！

【勸誡任務@ 5 Nov】
💎 ACT電郵 (OK便利店買家) 💎
sac@couche-tard.com (電郵範本喺留言)

💎 ACT (OK便利店買家) 💎
https://www.facebook.com/CoucheTardQc

💎 Circle K (國際版) 💎
https://www.facebook.com/CircleKStores/



EMAIL template


Please Stop Cooperate with TVB

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing as a Hong Kong customer to express my concern regarding the marketing strategy of the Hong Kong Branch of Circle K.

Since 2019, the Hong Kong Branch of Circle K has become the logistic partner of Big Big Shop, an online store of HK Television Broadcasts Limited (TVB). TVB is a Pro-Chinese Communist Party(CCP) television station that reports biased and fake news, spreading propaganda for CCP, and trying its best to justify all misbehaviors that the HK Government has done, for instance, justifying the Chinese espionage in the US, HK police brutality, the delay of the LegCo election in 2020, etc. Therefore, We, some of the Hongkongers are greatly disappointed by this business cooperation and has boycotted Circle K for more than a year.

Canada and the United States are the countries that uphold universal values, for instance, pursuing freedom, democracy, and human rights. We hope ACT, the new buyer of Circle K (Hong Kong business) would stand with Hong Kong and redeem the reputation by stop cooperating with TVB. We are looking forward to your reply. Thank you, ACT and Circle K, very much for understanding.

Regards,
(Your Name)

quote.msg: Vango即華潤，仲衰
咁7仔算

牛奶公司呀，仲藍，試過自動提交手足既CCTV比黑狗
依家頭買飲品就759/百佳/aboutthai
要買野食就搵就近黃店或者唔食當減肥，或者一早買定野食放公司
要買麵包就去a1 bakery或者759都有包買
買報紙就報紙檔/abouthai，有時街市入面都會有報紙檔賣

雖然唔係話必要時唔可以幫襯，始終有時就餓死都要買最平既野頂著下先，但希望盡量減少啦

Btw,提提你，ok=聖安娜
美心=711
華潤=vango
